name: johnpbloch/wordpress 4.7.4.1
body:
Update `johnpbloch/wordpress` package to 4.7.4.1 to fix file integrity issues. See https://github.com/johnpbloch/wordpress/issues/32 for more details.

This is **not** an actual WordPress version.

name: WordPress 4.7.1
body:
- Update to WordPress 4.7.1
- Add Optional variables to `.env.example`
- Remove unnecessary gitignore rules ([#286](https://github.com/roots/bedrock/pull/286))

name: WordPress 4.7
body:
- Update to WordPress 4.7
- Default `WP_ENV` to `production` instead of `development` ([#277](https://github.com/roots/bedrock/pull/277))
Bump PHP requirement to >= 5.6 (5.5 is no longer supported)

name: Add wp-password-bcrypt
body: - Add [wp-password-bcrypt](https://github.com/roots/wp-password-bcrypt) for more secure passwords ([#243](https://github.com/roots/bedrock/pull/243))

name: WPackagist fixes
body: Use HTTPS for wpackagist.org for compatibility with newer Composer versions. And better security!
Bump `composer/installers` dependency to `1.0.23` to fix deprecation notice
Use [oscarotero/env](https://github.com/oscarotero/env) instead of `getenv` ([#229](https://github.com/roots/bedrock/pull/233))

- Fix `DISABLE_WP_CRON` setting via ENV variable ([#229](https://github.com/roots/bedrock/pull/229))
- Set default `DB_CHARSET` to `utf8mb4`

name: WordPress 4.3.1 + PHP 5.5
body:
- Update to WordPress 4.3.1
- Bump Composer's PHP requirement to 5.5

name: Dotenv update
body: Update Dotenv dependency to 2.0.1
Remove `.env` file generation/installation script

name: WordPress 4.1.1 fix
body: - Fix `composer.lock`

name: v1.3.3
body:
- WordPress 4.1.1
- mu-plugins autoloader Multisite fix
- Coding standards update + TravisCI integration

name: WordPress 4.1
body:
- Update to WordPress 4.1
- Remove WPLANG constant

name: v1.3.1
body: Add Capistrano task to fix/update WP theme paths after deploys (#101)

name: v1.3.0
body:
- Update to WordPress 4.0.1
- Use johnpbloch/wordpress package instead of custom repository
- Update default deploy.rb
- Require PHP >= 5.4 in composer.json
- Better PSR-1 adherence
- Update phpdotenv dependency to 1.0.9
- Fix Composer installer path plugin order
- Add bedrock-autoloader mu-plugin

name: WordPress 4.0
body: - Update to WordPress 4.0

name: WordPress 3.9.2
body:
- WordPress 3.9.2
- Minor deploy fix
- Doc updates

name: WordPress 3.9.1
body:
- WordPress 3.9.1
- Doc updates
- Add `DB_PREFIX` constant
- Update Gem versions
- Disallow indexing in non-production environments

name: 3.9 package fix
body: Update `composer.lock` for 3.9 update and fix `composer create-project` error.

name: WordPress 3.9
body: - Update `wordpress/wordpress` package to 3.9

name: WordPress 3.8.3
body:
- Bump `wordpress/wordpress` package to version 3.8.3
- Only run `Dotenv::load` if `.env` file exists

http://wordpress.org/news/2014/04/wordpress-3-8-3/

name: WordPress 3.8.2
body:
Bump `wordpress/wordpress` package to version 3.8.2

http://wordpress.org/news/2014/04/wordpress-3-8-2/

name: WP-CLI updates & WordPress package vendor name
body:
- WP package now has `wordpress` vendor name: `wordpress/wordpress`
- Remove WP-CLI from Composer and add `wp-cli.yml` config

name: Package updates
body:
- Update phpdotenv to `1.0.6`
- Update wp-cli to `v0.14.1`
- Update `README` to reference new WordPress Packagist namespaces
- Fix uploads path in `linked_dirs` for Capistrano deploys

name: WP 3.8.1 & web directory
body:
- Update to Capistrano 3.1.0: `deploy:restart` is no longer run by default
- Better webroot structure: introduces the `/web` directory as the document/web root for web server vhosts
- `.env` creation via composer `create-project` post install script
- Better documentation in README
- Minor fixes
- WordPress 3.8.1
